title: Rockhurst High School STEAM Blog
description: A blog for the Rockhurst High School STEAM program. The blog is built using Jekyll and hosted on GitHub Pages. The blog was updated by students and teachers in the program.

title: Two Party Visualizer
description: A data visualization of word counts from perceptions of two different groups. The data is pulled from a Google Sheet and displayed using D3.js.

title: Freshman Retreat
description: A quiz game website for the Rockhurst High School Freshman Retreat. The was combines a multiple choice quiz game with YouTube embeds and uses React to pull data from a Google Sheet.

title: Park Crossing - Paint Chips
description: A website for the Park Crossing neighborhood in Kansas City. The website was built using jQuery and pulls data from a Google Sheet.
